ValidationRule.description: On Order Entry opportunities the Intacct Entity should match the Opportunity Intacct Entity or be a sublocation for it.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(Opportunity.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'OrderEntry', IF(!ISBLANK( Opportunity.ia_crm__Intacct_Location__c ), IF(OR( ia_crm__Intacct_Entity__c = Opportunity.ia_crm__Intacct_Location__c, ia_crm__Intacct_Entity__r.ia_crm__Top_Entity__c = Opportunity.ia_crm__Intacct_Location__c, ISBLANK(ia_crm__Intacct_Entity__c)), false, true), false), false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Intacct Entity from the Opportunity Product should match the Opportunity Intacct Entity or be a sublocation for it.
